item.title: Among the Zulus and Amatongas: with sketches of the natives, their language and customs; and the country, products, climate, wild animals &c
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book Among the Zulus and Amatongas: with with sketches of the natives, their language and customs; and the country, products, climate, wild animals &c. by the late David Leslie. Edited by the Hon. W. H. Drummond,. Second Edition. EdinBurgh: Edmonston & Douglas. London: MacMillan & Co. Glasgow: J. Maclehouse, 1875.]
